title: Verify user can successfully place order with valid payment and billing details.
preconditions: Basket has at least one item.
steps_actions:
1. "Enter valid billing details"
2. "Enter valid payment details"
3. "Click \u201cContinue to checkout.\u201d"

title: Verify basket total updates correctly when items are added.
preconditions: User is logged in with empty basket.

title: Verify basket total updates when items are removed.
Verify promo code applies discount correctly.
preconditions: Basket has at least one item, valid promo code exists.

title: Verify delivery option changes total price when selected.
preconditions: Basket has at least one item.

title: Verify order persists after page refresh before checkout.
Verify user cannot proceed to checkout with empty basket
Verify invalid credit card number is rejected.
preconditions: Basket has at least one item.
steps_actions:
1. "Enter valid billing"
2. "Enter invalid card number (letters or short digits)."

title: Verify expired credit card is rejected.
preconditions: Basket has at least one item.

title: Verify mandatory fields cannot be left empty.
preconditions: Basket has at least one item.
steps_actions:
1. "Leave Name\/Email\/Address\/Card number empty"
2. "Click on continue to check out button"

title: Verify invalid email format is rejected.
preconditions: Basket has at least one item.

title: Verify special characters in “First name” or “Last name” are not accepted.
preconditions: Basket has at least one item.
steps_actions: 1. "Enter invalid first name or last name."

title: Verify alphanumeric or special characters in credit card number are rejected.
preconditions: Basket has at least one item.

title: Verify CVV accepts only 3–4 digits.
preconditions: Basket has at least one item.

title: Verify invalid promo code is rejected.
preconditions: Basket has at least one item.

title: Verify basket counter does not go below 0.
steps_actions: 1. "Try removing item when basket is empty."
